name: UX Designer Interview Questions & Answers
description:
Listed out common Q&A that ux designers & researcher might face during a job interview. In this file, we cover:

  1. Tell us about yourself?
  2. What is UX Design?
  3. Tell me about some of your favorite examples of good UX?
  4. What is the difference between UX & UI?
  5. Walk me through your workflow/what is design thinking.
  6. What kind of research methods do you use?
  7. How do you respond to negative feedback?
  8. Tell me about your most/least successful UX design project.
  9. How would you improve the UX of our product?
  10. Where do you find inspiration?
  11. Do you have any questions for us (interviewers)?
  12. What are the next trends of UX design?
  13. What do you see yourself in 5 years?
  14. What are some biggest challenges you faced as a UX designer?
  15. Show us a design example that solved a business problem..
  16. Do you practice universal design?
